text:
Hey Wayne!

We added this layer: <https://github.com/CryptoManufaktur-io/canton-docker/blob/main/validator-migration.yaml>

So for an upgrade, users can add `validator-migration.yaml` to `COMPOSE_FILE=` in their `.env`.

Disaster recovery is still work in progress for us, we'll be testing that in the next couple of weeks.

text:
Hey everyone, Is there an API on the validator that can tell me the current migration ID it is configured to a way to know if migration is still needed for this node. I am trying some automation around it to check migration schedule and current migration ID as per validator and if they differ, migration is needed, if they are the same and reporting ready, migration is complete.
Looking forward to a response.
Thanks

elements.text:
Hey everyone, Is there an API on the validator that can tell me the current migration ID it is configured to a way to know if migration is still needed for this node. I am trying some automation around it to check migration schedule and current migration ID as per validator and if they differ, migration is needed, if they are the same and reporting ready, migration is complete.
Looking forward to a response.
Thanks

text: Doesn't the curl on scan api from docs to check if our IP has been whitelisted show the remote version and migration id ?

elements.text: Doesn't the curl on scan api from docs to check if our IP has been whitelisted show the remote version and migration id ?

text: Yes it does show but that is the remote migration ID, I am looking for an API that gives me the migration ID that my node is currently configured to check if it differs from the remote
